title: Every Breath You Take Police Surveillance Society Person of Interest STEREO HiQ JARichardsFilm 1080p
author: jarichards99utube
comment: I love Person Of Interest! I have all five seasons on DVD! Amy Acker (aka Root) is my favorite actress!

God, Ja, this video is  perfectly beautiful ! Thank you so much !
 😊 More!
 God bless 🌷

Hi ja, I hope all is good with you in light of recent events. Store shelves in McMinnville, Oregon are the most bare I have seen them in 30 years, unprecedented. This is surely the video you said was coming, a sad commentary on the world today and one's lack of privacy. Walk into a Walmart, they have facial recognition technology at the door. On a lighter note, just a few more days of Winter, had a last dab of snow on Saturday the 14th. All the best, C.
Good work on that video !!! CHeers !!!
Love this song bye police the only one i like by them every breath you take:)<3
description:
